channel.title: How i make shops on 317 exion source?
channel.description: Hi guys im using exion 317 source and it is my first rsps. can you help me with shops??? it got shops but how i add some items and make the price lower???? i got teamviewer pls help!

item.title: How i make shops on 317 exion source?
item.dc:creator: @suber_man suber man
item.description:
@suber_man wrote:

ok, i show you how to add custom items to a shop.

first:
go to your files and click on config.
search for shops.
double click to open it.

then u should see like this.

shop = 1	Pk_Point_Exchange				2	2	13664	10	7608	10	7609	10	10012	10	10011	10	9003	10	8888	10	10013	10	8703	10	2695	10	2698	10	2701	10	2704	10	2707	10	2710	10	2713	10	2716	10	2719	10	2722	10	2725	10	2728	10	2731	10	2734	10	2737	10

this is just 1 shop and at my sourche above.
but its then 1 line.
above the shop it said buy and sell and amount.

if u want to change a item then do like this.
item/amount

7608	10

change it to this to get a godsword.

35	10

the “10” means the amount and the max that u can buy in 1 time.

how to change price of items:
go to your item.cfg file.
double click.
u should see then alot of items.
press CTRL F and search for a item.
im going to search now for godsword.

item = 35	Armadyl_godsword	This_used_to_belong_to_King_Arthur.	500000	1000	500000	0	132	80	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	132	8

but then is it 1 long line.
change it to this:

item = 35	Armadyl_godsword	This_used_to_belong_to_King_Arthur.	5000000	1000	5000000	0	132	80	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	132	8

save it and close it.
now it cost 5M

this is a short for you because its only a post.
this took me 10 min to make it so i hope it works.

Read full topic
item.source: How i make shops on 317 exion source?
